RenoiseScriptingTool.Name: OrderNotes
RenoiseScriptingTool.Description:
Order notes in columns ascendingly according to key and octave.
Everything in a note column (note, instrument, volume, panning and delay) up to and including note offs is moved along with the note.
After sorting the track columns are contracted.
To use this tool assign OrderNotes it to a key in Edit -> Preferences -> Keys and press this key to order notes in the current track in the song.
